With over 25 years of experience in the software industry, I am a senior solutions architect and embedded engineering program manager at Crunchy Data, a leading provider of cloud-native PostgreSQL solutions. My mission is to help customers embed the Postgres Operator for Kubernetes in their software offerings for distribution, enabling them to leverage the power and flexibility of cloud-native databases.
